topic.title: Current Situation on Censorship / Site Shutdowns http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FqhRosMouo37Z8iDpLTEPvfznBq1b4N4w
topic.body: I've been told it's "Nearly In-possible to shut down sites" using ZeroNet. Don't understand this..

1_12qRBHbFje4Bn4fqoJjZUUevH5aFyWZrmW.body: Thanks lads, I honestly thought it might of been a troll. There is an overlay in the background of the old Silk Road, so I knew it couldn't of been Official.
